title: VSCode
details: A lightweight, extensible code editor with debugging, syntax highlighting, and version control integration.
source: All web, backend, and scripting projects

title: Linux CLI
details: A command-line interface for interacting with Unix-based systems, automating tasks, and managing environments.

title: Vim
details: A highly configurable command-line text editor for efficient code editing and system configuration.

title: tmux
details: A terminal multiplexer that allows multiple terminal sessions to be accessed and controlled from a single screen.

title: Eclipse
details: Extensible IDE commonly used for Java development, with support for C/C++ and plugins.
source: Used in Java coursework for object-oriented backend projects
